plants.name: Dumbcane
plants.about: It is a tropical species that grows quickly and is easy to handle.
plants.water_tips: Keep the soil always moist without soaking. Water 2 times a week.

plants.name: Zamioculca
plants.about: Although it blooms in the spring, it stays beautiful and green all year round.
plants.water_tips: Use pots with holes and stones at the bottom to facilitate drainage. Water once a day.

plants.name: Peperomia
plants.about: Adapts to both sun and shade but prefers to stay in a cool spot, without direct sunlight.
plants.water_tips: On hotter days, spray water on the leaves. Water 3 times a week.

plants.name: Philodendron
plants.about: A medium-sized plant that adapts to various regions and is easy to cultivate. Itâ€™s winning more and more people over.
plants.water_tips: Keep the soil always moist without soaking. Water 2 times a week.

plants.name: Snake Plant
plants.about: Its aroma reduces anxiety levels and its scent helps improve sleep quality and productivity during the day.
plants.water_tips: Water the soil around it. Water once a day.

plants.name: Yucca
plants.about: These are recommended because they are easy to maintain and care for. You can place them in small pots or even in cups.
plants.water_tips: Thanks to their water storage, it's always better to water them sparingly. Water once a week.

plants.name: Fruit-bearing plants
plants.about: Require a few hours of sunlight per day, so place them near windows.
plants.water_tips: Always water the soil, not the leaves. Water 3 times a week.

plants.name: Orchid
plants.about: Brings a sense of tranquility and peace to the environment. Requires little maintenance and is great for those with limited space.
plants.water_tips: Water moderately. Water 4 times a week.

plants.name: Viola
plants.about: With delicate flowers, they are great suggestions for decorating the bathroom.
plants.water_tips: Avoid wetting the flowers and leaves. Water the soil 2 times a week.

plants.name: Hydrangea
plants.about: Hydrangea is a hardy plant that adapts to different soil types.
plants.water_tips: Keep the soil always moist without soaking. Water once a day.
